column4: im following this guide: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=305665&highlight=fglrx%2Bedgy .. but after running "sudo modprobe fglrx" I get the error: Not loading fglrx module; not used in /etc/X11/xorg.conf .. I tried following Troubleshooting step 1, but no luck
what driver are you using?   do cat /etc/X11/xorg.conf |grep Driver
